statements: DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 10;
DELETE FROM social_media_data WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND post LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM comments WHERE customer_id = 123 AND post_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM posts WHERE customer_id = 123)
DELETE FROM posts WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01' AND post_id NOT IN (SELECT post_id FROM comments)
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM posts)
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 123 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM post_likes WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM post_likes WHERE post_id = 456);
DELETE FROM post_comments WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM user_profile WHERE location = 'New York');
